name: Rocket Ghost Aidan 2
description:
Interested? Try the demo to see if you would like it!

Rocket Ghost Aidan 2 picks up where the first game left off, Aidan and the band of pirates entering into Com's dimension. Join him and the crew as they must journey through mysterious land with new enimes, levels, and secrets. What will Com have in store for Aidan, Captain Wucum, and the crew?

  • Both a challenging and fun platforming experience

  • Engaging gameplay

  • Full health power ups

  • 77 dense levels to explore and master

  • Over 750 Nector Coins to collect

  • 41 treasure chest delivering challenges

  • A even better soundtrack than the first Rocket Ghost Aidan

  • Side stories

  • Unlockable cosmetics

  • An easy mode

  • Tutorial
